Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>Sure, yeah, we're kinda not wearing the
usual gear here. But we're just following
orders. It's not weird. Not weird at all.
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>Still, that girl who works in the stable
took one look at all of us and left. She's
<clr:0000>far over there<clr:ffff>...and won't come back.
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughL_00>Doesn't she know we're the real deal?
We're the Zonai Survey Team!<sp:5:1:0> This is all
super official. It's not weird.
Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You're heading out now?<sp:5:0:0> That makes
sense. Nice to get an early start.
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>So, you're back again,<sp:5:0:0> traveler!


I keep saying this...<sp:5:0:0>but yeah, we're kinda
not wearing the usual gear, but we're just
following orders. Not weird. No way.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_01>Still, that girl who works in the stable took
one look at all of us and left. She's far
over there...and won't come back.
<sp:3:0:2:0201>She's got to know, though, that we're the
real deal! The Zonai Survey Team!<sp:5:1:0> This is
as far from weird as it gets.
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Are you serious? I'm glad everyone back
home is OK. Whew! What a relief.
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad>Oh man...<sp:5:1:0> That girl from the stable...


There's no way she'll talk to any of us on
the team if we're dressed like this.
Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Tired_01>When I return to <clr:0000>Lurelin Village<clr:ffff>, I think
I'll try and raise a dog too.
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_01>Oh, it's you, traveler! Thanks to you, we
could all dress normally again!

<sp:3:0:2:0801>Then that girl from the stable came over
to talk to some of us on the survey team.
She knows a LOT <clr:0000>about dogs<clr:ffff>!
<snd:Happy_00>There aren't many girls right around my
age in <clr:0000>Lurelin Village<clr:ffff>. So, yeah, gotta say
it was great to talk.
Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You're heading out now?<sp:5:0:0> Good thinking.
A little safer these days when the sun's
high in the sky.
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_01>Here you are again! How are your travels
treating you?

I'm still having good talks with that girl
at the stable <clr:0000>about dogs<clr:ffff>.

<snd:Happy_00>There aren't many girls right around my
age in <clr:0000>Lurelin Village<clr:ffff>. So, I gotta say it's
always great to talk.
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You're heading out now?<sp:5:0:0> Well, I can't
think of many things nicer than traveling
by moonlight.
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_01>Who knew I'd get so excited <clr:0000>talking
about dogs<clr:ffff>.

No one ever seemed to talk about dogs
at all when I lived in <clr:0000>Lurelin Village<clr:ffff>.
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think_01>Y-<sp:5:1:0>you're all wrong. <sp:5:0:0>We're following
Princess Zelda's orders...<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sigh>She'll surely return if you...<sp:5:1:0>just dress like
regular people.
Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You're heading out now?<sp:5:0:0> Well, it is
really beautiful around here earlier in
the evening.
Watch where you're going though. Easy
to look at the view and take a bad step!
Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Oh, yes... There's almost nothing better
than <clr:0000>talking about dogs<clr:ffff> to just make a
person feel happy.
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_01>How did this happen? I was the last
member of the team to reach this
survey location.
By then, everyone was dressed like this
by order of Princess Zelda. Why would
she give such a strange command?
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Ease>I just joined the Zonai Survey Team and
thought I'd be investigating ruins. But
researching monsters seems interesting.
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:QuestionAngry_00>What are you thinking?! You guys are all
making our research team look like fools!<sp:5:0:0>

I think you DO look weird. So there,
chew on that.
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>That's where I come from. Far, far, far
to the <clr:0000>southeast<clr:ffff> from here.

It's on the sea. Everyone there makes a
living by fishing.

I can't swim. Just don't have the knack
for it. So I didn't bother with all that
fisherman stuff.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>Being on the Zonai Survey Team is the
life for me. So I volunteered for action,
and action's what I got!
But I have to say, I heard that <clr:0000>pirates<clr:ffff>
have taken over my village. That...<sp:5:1:0>worries
me. I'm not sure if I can ever go back.
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>The girl at the stable says she likes dogs,
so I started learning about them!

Turns out that when dogs <clr:0000>get close<clr:ffff> with a
person, they'll <clr:0000>find treasure for them<clr:ffff>!

<sp:3:0:2:0101>What's that?<sp:5:0:0> How do you get close with a
dog? <sp:5:1:0>Well...<sp:5:1:0>love and loyalty, of course!
